tree.name: Jock Landale
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks acquired Landale from Jazz for cash considerations
tree.note: Australian center, skilled post player. Jazz had just acquired him from Memphis in JJJ deal 2 days prior.

assetsGivenUp.name: Cash Considerations
assetsGivenUp.note: Hawks sent cash to Utah for Landale

tradeChain.name: Jock Landale
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Jazz acquired Landale (with Jaren Jackson Jr., Konchar, Vince Williams Jr.) from Grizzlies for Anderson, Clayton, Hendricks, Niang, and 3 first-round picks
tradeChain.note: Part of blockbuster JJJ trade to Utah

tradeChain.name: Jock Landale
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Grizzlies signed Landale as free agent after Rockets waived him, 1-year minimum deal
tradeChain.note: Waived by Houston Jul 3, signed with Memphis Jul 15

tradeChain.name: Jock Landale
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Rockets acquired Landale from Suns in Kevin Durant related moves

tradeChain.name: Jock Landale
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Spurs signed Landale from Melbourne United (NBL Australia)
tradeChain.note: ORIGIN - Undrafted 2018, Saint Mary's. NBL champion & Finals MVP 2021.
